Introduction

Forestella is a South Korean crossover vocal group. They were formed through the survival show Phantom Singer 2. They were under Universal Music Korea, Decca Records, and Arts & Artists. As of August 1, 2021, they are now under Beat Interactive. They consist of four members: Bae Doohoon, Kang Hyungho, Cho Mingyu, and Ko Woorim. They debuted on March 14, 2018, with the album Evolution. They’re known for their appearances on Two Yoo Project and Immortal Songs.
